title: i dont get it
body: i leveled a smurf to 30 during last years preseason, then didnt play a single normal after that.  i got it to plat, and only logged in once a month so it wouldnt drop out.  yesterday i decided to play some normals on it, thinking it would be low mmr.  you know, since i havent played a single normal for like 10 months on it.  yet for some reason everyone im playing with is diamond??? i dont want this, i wanted easy games.  why you do dis rito.
